item.title: Computational approaches to study molecular pathogenesis and intervention of infectious diseases
Reconciling Multiple Connectivity Scores for Drug Repurposing
item.description: KS and PT are co-primary authors. AK and JR are co-corresponding authors.

item.title: Host-responses to infection
item.description:
Summary

Leveraging non-infectious disease and drug perturbation transcriptomes to characterize host-response to infection and prioritize host-directed interventions.

Team

Students

  • Kewalin Samart (MSU)

Alumni

Collaborators
